: : Rodimus Prime : :

The doors to the mess hall hissed as they opened, allowing Roddy and Elita to enter. Rodimus grabs a bottle for Elita and a glass of energon for himself. He sits at a table, sips his drink, and then starts to feed Elita.

Rodimus Prime: I bet your hungry, arn't you, Elita? Drink up and maybe we can see mommy soon.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Elita::

"Dy dyyy, DYDYYY"said Elita while she gigled and spread her little 
arms towards Rodimus, she was amuzed when  her daddy took her and  
let her met  more of the base. 

That word again, could said  her youth mind, what could it mean? and 
she attemped to say it "NNYY!! NYYY!!"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus hadn't taken his eyes off of Nightlight. He just stood, 
> waiting for her proframming to be restored, for his wife to come 
back 
> to him. He is brought out of his trance by the cribs signal. Elita 
> was awake.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Azure, Yggdrasil, excuse me. I'll be right back, 
Elita 
> has just woken up.
> 
> Rodimus heads to his quarters, where he finds Elita in the crib. He 
> picks her up.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Hello there, lil' one. Let's take a little walk. 
I'll 
> get you some energon and food at the mess hall, and then maybe 
mommy 
> will be back by then.
> 
> Roddy walks out going to the mess hall. This gave Elita a new 
chance 
> to look around new areas of the ship.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Elita::
> > 
> > ELita woke up and yawed, she looked around and though where daddy 
> > could be. She moved uneasy and mewoed calling her father
